trans-unit.source: Manages asynchronous operations and handles management information and events received asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 管理异步操作和处理异步接收的管理信息和事件。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to perform an asynchronous instance enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何执行一个异步的实例的枚举。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.Management.ManagementOperationObserver> class to handle management information and events asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 该示例使用<xref:System.Management.ManagementOperationObserver>类以异步方式处理管理信息和事件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Management.ManagementOperationObserver" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Management.ManagementOperationObserver" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This is the default constructor.
trans-unit.target: 这是默认构造函数。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 安全性

trans-unit.source: Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 对直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to perform an asynchronous instance enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何执行一个异步的实例的枚举。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.Management.ManagementOperationObserver> class to handle management information and events asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 该示例使用<xref:System.Management.ManagementOperationObserver>类以异步方式处理管理信息和事件。

trans-unit.source: Cancels all outstanding operations.
trans-unit.target: 取消所有未完成的操作。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 安全性

trans-unit.source: Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 对直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an operation has completed.
trans-unit.target: 完成操作后发生。

trans-unit.source: Event Data
trans-unit.target: 事件数据

trans-unit.source: The event handler receives an argument of type <xref:System.Management.CompletedEventArgs> containing data related to this event.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序接收类型的自变量<xref:System.Management.CompletedEventArgs>包含数据与此事件。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Management.CompletedEventArgs> properties provide information specific to this event.
trans-unit.target: 以下<xref:System.Management.CompletedEventArgs>属性提供了特定于此事件的信息。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Management.ManagementEventArgs.Context%2A> (inherited from <xref:System.Management.ManagementEventArgs>)
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Management.ManagementEventArgs.Context%2A> (继承自<xref:System.Management.ManagementEventArgs>)

trans-unit.source: Gets the operation context echoed back from the operation that triggered the event.
trans-unit.target: 获取从触发了事件的操作返回回显的操作上下文。

trans-unit.source: Gets the completion status of the operation.
trans-unit.target: 获取操作的完成状态。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets additional status information within a WMI object.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 WMI 对象内的其他状态信息。

trans-unit.source: This may be null.
trans-unit.target: 这可能为 null。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 安全性

trans-unit.source: Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 对直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to perform an asynchronous instance enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何执行一个异步的实例的枚举。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.Management.ManagementOperationObserver> class to handle management information and events asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 该示例使用<xref:System.Management.ManagementOperationObserver>类以异步方式处理管理信息和事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an object has been successfully committed.
trans-unit.target: 成功提交对象后发生。

trans-unit.source: Event Data
trans-unit.target: 事件数据

trans-unit.source: The event handler receives an argument of type <xref:System.Management.ObjectPutEventArgs> containing data related to this event.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序接收类型的自变量<xref:System.Management.ObjectPutEventArgs>包含数据与此事件。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Management.ObjectPutEventArgs> properties provide information specific to this event.
trans-unit.target: 以下<xref:System.Management.ObjectPutEventArgs>属性提供了特定于此事件的信息。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Management.ManagementEventArgs.Context%2A> (inherited from <xref:System.Management.ManagementEventArgs>)
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Management.ManagementEventArgs.Context%2A> (继承自<xref:System.Management.ManagementEventArgs>)

trans-unit.source: Gets the operation context echoed back from the operation that triggered the event.
trans-unit.target: 获取从触发了事件的操作返回回显的操作上下文。

trans-unit.source: Gets the identity of the object that has been put.
trans-unit.target: 获取已放置对象的标识。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 安全性

trans-unit.source: Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 对直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a new object is available.
trans-unit.target: 新对象可用时发生。

trans-unit.source: Event Data
trans-unit.target: 事件数据

trans-unit.source: The event handler receives an argument of type <xref:System.Management.ObjectReadyEventArgs> containing data related to this event.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序接收类型的自变量<xref:System.Management.ObjectReadyEventArgs>包含数据与此事件。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Management.ObjectReadyEventArgs> properties provide information specific to this event.
trans-unit.target: 以下<xref:System.Management.ObjectReadyEventArgs>属性提供了特定于此事件的信息。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Management.ManagementEventArgs.Context%2A> (inherited from <xref:System.Management.ManagementEventArgs>)
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Management.ManagementEventArgs.Context%2A> (继承自<xref:System.Management.ManagementEventArgs>)

trans-unit.source: Gets the operation context echoed back from the operation that triggered the event.
trans-unit.target: 获取从触发了事件的操作返回回显的操作上下文。

trans-unit.source: Gets the newly-returned object.
trans-unit.target: 获取新返回的对象。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 安全性

trans-unit.source: Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 对直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to perform an asynchronous instance enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何执行一个异步的实例的枚举。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.Management.ManagementOperationObserver> class to handle management information and events asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 该示例使用<xref:System.Management.ManagementOperationObserver>类以异步方式处理管理信息和事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs to indicate the progress of an ongoing operation.
trans-unit.target: 它的出现是为了指示正在进行的操作的进度。

trans-unit.source: Event Data
trans-unit.target: 事件数据

trans-unit.source: The event handler receives an argument of type <xref:System.Management.ProgressEventArgs> containing data related to this event.
trans-unit.target: 事件处理程序接收类型的自变量<xref:System.Management.ProgressEventArgs>包含数据与此事件。

trans-unit.source: The following <xref:System.Management.ProgressEventArgs> properties provide information specific to this event.
trans-unit.target: 以下<xref:System.Management.ProgressEventArgs>属性提供了特定于此事件的信息。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Management.ManagementEventArgs.Context%2A> (inherited from <xref:System.Management.ManagementEventArgs>)
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Management.ManagementEventArgs.Context%2A> (继承自<xref:System.Management.ManagementEventArgs>)

trans-unit.source: Gets the operation context echoed back from the operation that triggered the event.
trans-unit.target: 获取从触发了事件的操作返回回显的操作上下文。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current amount of work done by the operation.
trans-unit.target: 获取操作已完成的当前工作量。

trans-unit.source: This is always less than or equal to <xref:System.Management.ProgressEventArgs.UpperBound%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 这总是小于或等于 <xref:System.Management.ProgressEventArgs.UpperBound%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets optional additional information regarding the operation's progress.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置有关操作进度的可选附加信息。

trans-unit.source: Gets the total amount of work required to be done by the operation.
trans-unit.target: 获取该操作需要完成的总工作量。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 安全性

trans-unit.source: Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 对直接调用方的完全信任。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 此成员不能由部分信任的代码使用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[通过部分受信任的代码使用库](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。
